name: W2Ski Widget
author: SiteUP™

sections.description:
The plugin provides a WordPress widget available to use and also a shortcode so that you can integrate the where2ski.net widget anywhere on your website.

What is Where2Ski.net?

http://where2ski.net is a website that provides easy comparison of Ski Resorts. Whenever you are debating with your friends which place to go to skiing, you can use this handy little website to get all the stats that you need in one convenient place. No more surfing on tens of websites looking for the right info.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Search and install the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the [w2ski] shortcode anywhere or place the widget from the Appearance section
sections.faq:
Do I need a special key?

Not exactly.
The plugin will work if you choose to support the site (via a link). If not then yes, you need a special “activation” key. You can talk with the where2ski.net admin and ask for a key. The process is in development so that a more automated option will exist in future releases.
sections.changelog:
** version 0.1.3 ** Updated the description of the plugin

** version 0.1.2 ** Added option to remove the link

** version 0.1 ** Initial release
